languages.text: {n}Спустя некоторое время Горнило явило восторженным свидетелям чудо видения — взглядам собравшихся на диспут предстали святые образы мучеников и страстотерпцев, осеняющих древний артефакт своим благословением. И пускай отдельные свидетели утверждали, что видели мельком странных людей с линзовыми аппаратами, большинство собравшихся признало факт чуда — и статус Горнила как святыни.{/n}

{n}After some time, the Crucible revealed a miraculous vision: sacred images of martyrs appeared before the awestruck witnesses and blessed the ancient artefact. And even though some claimed to have caught a glimpse of some suspicious individuals operating lens machines, most of those present acknowledged the fact of this miracle, and the status of the Crucible as a relic.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Спустя некоторое время Горнило явило восторженным свидетелям чудо видения — взглядам собравшихся на диспут предстали святые образы мучеников и страстотерпцев, осеняющих древний артефакт своим благословением. И пускай отдельные свидетели утверждали, что видели мельком странных людей с линзовыми аппаратами, большинство собравшихся признало факт чуда — и статус Горнила как святыни.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}After some time, the Crucible had revealed the visual miracle to the enthusiastic spectators — presenting to the dispute attendees the sacred images of martyrs blessing the ancient artefact. And even though some witnesses claimed to have caught a glimpse of some strange people operating the lens machines, most of those present have admitted the fact of the miracle, and the status of the Crucible as a relic.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一段时间过后，熔炉向热忱的围观者展示了视讯奇迹。聚集熔炉旁边的辩论者亲眼目睹了殉道者祝福古代圣物的神圣景象。尽管一部分目击者声称自己瞥见了某个古怪的人在操作某种透镜仪器，但绝大多数在场的人都承认了这样的奇迹，认定熔炉属于圣物。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After some time, the Crucible revealed a visual miracle to the enthusiastic spectators, presenting to those gathered for the debate sacred images of martyrs blessing the ancient artefact. And even though some witnesses claimed to have caught a glimpse of some strange people operating the lens machines, most of those present have admitted the fact of this miracle, and the status of the Crucible as a relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一段时间过后，熔炉向热忱的围观者展示了视讯奇迹。聚集熔炉旁边的辩论者亲眼目睹了殉道者祝福古代圣物的神圣景象。尽管一部分目击者声称自己瞥见了某个古怪的人在操作某种透镜仪器，但绝大多数在场的人都承认了这样的奇迹，认定熔炉属于圣物。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al cabo de un tiempo, el Crisol reveló una visión milagrosa: imágenes sagradas de mártires aparecieron ante los asombrados feligreses para bendecir el antiguo artefacto. Y aunque algunos afirmaron haber visto a individuos sospechosos manejando máquinas de lentes, la mayoría de los presentes reconocieron el milagro y la condición de reliquia del Crisol.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After some time, the Crucible revealed a miraculous vision: sacred images of martyrs appeared before the awestruck witnesses and blessed the ancient artefact. And even though some claimed to have caught a glimpse of some suspicious individuals operating lens machines, most of those present acknowledged the fact of this miracle, and the status of the Crucible as a relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al cabo de un tiempo, el Crisol reveló una visión milagrosa: imágenes sagradas de mártires aparecieron ante los asombrados feligreses para bendecir el antiguo artefacto. Y aunque algunos afirmaron haber visto a individuos sospechosos manejando máquinas de lentes, la mayoría de los presentes reconocieron el milagro y la condición de reliquia del Crisol.{/n}

languages.text: {n}しばらくして、坩堝は熱狂的な見物人に視覚的な奇跡を明らかにし、討論会に集まった関係者に、古代のアーティファクトを祝福する殉教者たちの神聖なイメージを見せた。また、レンズ機械を操作する奇妙な人物が見えたという目撃者も複数いたが、その場にいた者のほとんどは、この奇跡の事実と、坩堝の遺物としての地位を認めるようになった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After some time, the Crucible revealed a visual miracle to the enthusiastic spectators, presenting to those gathered for the debate sacred images of martyrs blessing the ancient artefact. And even though some witnesses claimed to have caught a glimpse of some strange people operating the lens machines, most of those present have admitted the fact of this miracle, and the status of the Crucible as a relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}しばらくして、坩堝は熱狂的な見物人に視覚的な奇跡を明らかにし、討論会に集まった関係者に、古代のアーティファクトを祝福する殉教者たちの神聖なイメージを見せた。また、レンズ機械を操作する奇妙な人物が見えたという目撃者も複数いたが、その場にいた者のほとんどは、この奇跡の事実と、坩堝の遺物としての地位を認めるようになった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après quelque temps, le Creuset révèle une vision miraculeuse : des images saintes de martyrs bénissant l'antique artefact sous les yeux de l'assemblée enthousiaste. Et bien que certains affirment avoir aperçu de mystérieuses silhouettes s'affairant autour de machines lenticulaires, la plupart des témoins admettent la réalité de ce miracle et concluent au statut de relique du Creuset.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After some time, the Crucible revealed a miraculous vision: sacred images of martyrs appeared before the awestruck witnesses and blessed the ancient artefact. And even though some claimed to have caught a glimpse of some suspicious individuals operating lens machines, most of those present acknowledged the fact of this miracle, and the status of the Crucible as a relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après quelque temps, le Creuset révèle une vision miraculeuse : des images saintes de martyrs bénissant l'antique artefact sous les yeux de l'assemblée enthousiaste. Et bien que certains affirment avoir aperçu de mystérieuses silhouettes s'affairant autour de machines lenticulaires, la plupart des témoins admettent la réalité de ce miracle et concluent au statut de relique du Creuset.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nach einiger Zeit offenbarte der Tiegel den begeisterten Zuschauern ein visuelles Wunder. Er präsentierte den Teilnehmern der Debatte heilige Bilder von Märtyrern, die das uralte Artefakt segnen. Und obwohl einige Zeugen gesehen haben wollen, wie merkwürdige Leute die Linsenmaschinen bedient haben, mussten die meisten Anwesenden zugeben, dass das wirklich ein Wunder war — und der Tiegel eine Reliquie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After some time, the Crucible revealed a visual miracle to the enthusiastic spectators, presenting to those gathered for the debate sacred images of martyrs blessing the ancient artefact. And even though some witnesses claimed to have caught a glimpse of some strange people operating the lens machines, most of those present have admitted the fact of this miracle, and the status of the Crucible as a relic.{/n}

Er präsentierte den Teilnehmern der Debatte heilige Bilder von Märtyrern, die das uralte Artefakt segnen. Und obwohl einige Zeugen gesehen haben wollen, wie merkwürdige Leute die Linsenmaschinen bedient haben, mussten die meisten Anwesenden zugeben, dass das wirklich ein Wunder war — und der Tiegel eine Reliquie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir süre sonra Pota, mucizevi bir görü sundu: Huşu içindeki gözlemcilere şehitlerin kutsal görüntülerini gösterdi ve kadim yadigârı kutsadı. Bazıları, bir anlığına lens makineleri kullanan şüpheli şahıslar gördüklerini iddia etse de mevcuttakilerin büyük bir kısmı, bu mucizenin hakikatini ve Pota'nın bir yadigâr olarak tanınmasını kabul etti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After some time, the Crucible revealed a miraculous vision: sacred images of martyrs appeared before the awestruck witnesses and blessed the ancient artefact. And even though some claimed to have caught a glimpse of some suspicious individuals operating lens machines, most of those present acknowledged the fact of this miracle, and the status of the Crucible as a relic.{/n}
